name: Jarinko Chie: The Hanafuda
description:
Jarinko Chie: The Hanafuda is, as the name suggests, a Hanafuda card game featuring characters from the manga Jarinko Chie.

In Hanafuda, the goal is to collect suits of cards (all with a flower and seasonal theme) and gather more points than the opponent by pairing up cards on hand with the eight open face cards on the table.

The game features a story mode, where Chie faces off against different opponents from the manga in a set order along with the game's story. There's also the option to pick a character to play as and to play against in a free play mode.

shot.caption: The beginning of the story mode.
Chie got the better card and gets to go first.
Playing a game. The cards available to choose have a glowing border around them to aid the player along.
You won this round cat! You won't be so lucky next time!
